article_metadata.author: JEAN TARBETT HARDIMANThe Herald-Dispatch

og.description: HUNTINGTON --The impact of Cabell Huntington Hospital acquiring St. Mary's Medical Center on prices for consumers is raising concerns for at least one local businessman.
og.title: Hospital purchase debated
